Detailed Description

CameraView - is a Transform that is used to specify camera views from within the scene graph.

The application must attach a camera to a CameraView via the NodePath from the top of the scene graph to the CameraView node itself, and accumulate the view matrix from this NodePath.

void osg::CameraView::setFieldOfView ( double  fieldOfView  )  [inline]

Set the field of view.

The cameras field of view can be constrained to either the horizontal or vertex axis of the camera, or unconstrained in which case the camera/application are left to choose an appropriate field of view. The default value if 60 degrees.

void osg::CameraView::setFieldOfViewMode ( FieldOfViewMode  mode  )  [inline]

Set the field of view mode - controlling how the field of view of the camera is constrained by the CameaView settings.

void osg::CameraView::setFocalLength ( double  focalLength  )  [inline]

Set the focal length of the camera.

A focal length of 0.0 indicates that the camera/application should determine the focal length. The default value is 0.0.

void osg::CameraView::setPosition ( const Vec3d &  pos  )  [inline]

Set the position of the camera view.
